creator: Virgin Mobile UAE
descriptionHtml:
Get the Virgin Mobile App for an all-around amazing mobile experience. It’s simple - sign up in less than five minutes and we’ll deliver your SIM right to you.

Join now and save 50% with our yearly plans.

How to get started:
1. Download the Virgin Mobile App, choose a new mobile number or bring your existing one.
2. Build your own plan - you decide how much mobile data, local and international minutes you need.
3. Register your payment card details and we'll deliver your SIM card to you, wherever you are in the UAE. The driver will verify you on arrival - how cool is that!?

What’s under the hood? Features that Make Mobile Better for you:

BUILD YOUR OWN PLAN AND CHANGE IT ANYTIME
- Monthly payments with either your credit or debit card.
- Buy more data, local or international minutes whenever you want. We call them Boosters!
- Manage your international roaming packages.

CHOOSE YOUR FAVOURITE NUMBER OR BRING YOUR OWN
- Bring your current number with you or choose a new one.

GET YOUR SIM DELIVERED – within one hour
- Free SIM card delivery within one hour

FLEXIBLE – JUST THE WAY YOU LIKE IT
- Manage your mobile life in our easy to use app.
- No restrictive mobile contracts, come and go as you please.
- Track your usage of data and minutes in real-time.
- In-app help and support. Never queue in a mobile store again.
- Update your account details in the app.
- To make sure you don’t miss a thing, keep your updates and notifications turned on.

Keep your eyes on the “What’s New” section below. We’re always adding amazing new content on popular demand. Visit our website to learn more: https://www.virginmobile.ae/

Virgin Mobile is brought to you in the UAE by Emirates Integrated Telecommunications Company PJSC. Which means that we get to leverage great economies of scale in order to bring you more unique and innovative products and value.
descriptionShort: Talk, text & browse with Virgin Mobile in the UAE. Try us out!

Get the Virgin Mobile App for an all-around amazing mobile experience. It’s simple - sign up in less than five minutes and we’ll deliver your SIM right to you.

Join now and save 50% with our yearly plans.

How to get started:
1. Download the Virgin Mobile App, choose a new mobile number or bring your existing one.
2. Build your own plan - you decide how much mobile data, local and international minutes you need.
3. Register your payment card details and we'll deliver your SIM card to you, wherever you are in the UAE. The driver will verify you on arrival - how cool is that!?

What’s under the hood? Features that Make Mobile Better for you:

BUILD YOUR OWN PLAN AND CHANGE IT ANYTIME
- Monthly payments with either your credit or debit card.
- Buy more data, local or international minutes whenever you want. We call them Boosters!
- Manage your international roaming packages.

CHOOSE YOUR FAVOURITE NUMBER OR BRING YOUR OWN
- Bring your current number with you or choose a new one.

GET YOUR SIM DELIVERED – within one hour
- Free SIM card delivery within one hour

FLEXIBLE – JUST THE WAY YOU LIKE IT
- Manage your mobile life in our easy to use app.
- No restrictive mobile contracts, come and go as you please.
- Track your usage of data and minutes in real-time.
- In-app help and support. Never queue in a mobile store again.
- Update your account details in the app.
- To make sure you don’t miss a thing, keep your updates and notifications turned on.

Keep your eyes on the “What’s New” section below. We’re always adding amazing new content on popular demand. Visit our website to learn more: https://www.virginmobile.ae/

Virgin Mobile is brought to you in the UAE by Emirates Integrated Telecommunications Company PJSC. Which means that we get to leverage great economies of scale in order to bring you more unique and innovative products and value.
descriptionShort: Talk, text & browse with Virgin Mobile in the UAE. Try us out!

title: Virgin Mobile UAE

creator: Virgin Mobile UAE
descriptionHtml:
Join us and save 50% off Virgin Mobile’s Yearly Plans.

Our app allows you to manage your entire mobile plan digitally. It takes less than five minutes to sign up and we'll deliver your SIM within 60 minutes, wherever you are in the UAE.

Joining Virgin Mobile is SIMple.

Choose to keep your existing number and transfer your mobile plan to Virgin Mobile or choose a new number when you sign up.

Manage your entire mobile experience through our easy-to-use app.

Build your custom plan and have the flexibility to change it anytime.

- Track the usage of your data and minutes in real-time.
- Buy more data, or minutes (local and international) with Boosters. That way, you never run out of data or talk time.
- Use the app to choose and manage your roaming package.

What else?

- Free 1-year ‘the ENTERTAINER’ subscription for new users who buy Yearly Plans with 7GB+ data through SIM delivery.
- Free Anghami Plus with eligible Monthly, 6-Months, or Yearly Plans.
- Monthly cashback with Virgin Mobile Rewards.
- Free data sharing with friends and family, who subscribe to Virgin Mobile.
- Free Data Rollover. Should you not use up all of your data in one month, you can roll it over to the next.

Did you know? We offer flexible Home Internet too.

- It takes less than five minutes to sign up and your Home Internet will be delivered and connected in just 60 mins.
- Choose whether you want a device from us (or not) when you sign up.
- No contracts, no cancellation fees.
- Pay 12 months upfront and save 50%.
- No unwanted add-ons that you wouldn’t use.

How to get started?

- Download the Virgin Mobile App, choose a new mobile number, or bring your existing one.
- Work your magic and create your own plan - you decide how much mobile data and minutes (local and international) you need.
- Register your payment card details and we'll then deliver your SIM card right to you. The driver will verify you on arrival.

Keep your eyes on the “What’s New” section below. We’re always adding amazing new content on popular demand.

It’s all neat and tidy. Feel like you want to join Virgin Mobile?

You can visit our website to learn more: https://www.virginmobile.ae/

Or you could go to your nearest Virgin Mobile store:

Virgin Mobile is brought to you in the UAE by Emirates Integrated Telecommunications Company PJSC.
